_transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer token for a specified address

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The address to query the the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint representing the amount owned by the passed address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

getBlackListStatus(address).notice: //// Getters to allow the same blacklist to be used also by other contracts (including upgraded Tether) ///////
